mapper.select:
select seller_name,nickname, sum(product_price) as proceeds,email,phone,seller_id, TO_CHAR(order_dt, 'yyyy-mm') from total group by seller_name, nickname, seller_id,email,phone,seller_id,TO_CHAR(order_dt, 'yyyy-mm') having 1=1
and ${type} like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and to_char(order_dt, 'yyyy-mm') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm')
